report.title: Good and Bad
report.author: Micah
report.bodytext: After reading about DHEA for a while I decided to try it. I noticed an increase in concentration ability within an hour or two, and was initially very impressed with the results. By the second day, I noticed my body temperature had gone up a small amount. /n /n The third day the concentration effects had gone away, only to be replaced with a nagging headache. Nothing bad, I could ignore it, but it was very annoying. This usually signifies a bad reaction of some sort. I tried several combinations of vitamin/mineral supplements to see if the headache was caused by some deficiency, with no result. /n /n After 1 week, I stopped the use of DHEA as I only noticed marginal results, and plenty of side effects. Within a couple of days, the side effects listed below have disappeared. /n /n Pros: Increased mental clarity (marginal) /n Increased stamina/strength to some degree. /n /n Cons: Headache /n Poor sleep quality resulting in being continually tired.
